description.en:
Earneo is a real contender in the media sharing platform arena. What is unique about Earneo, compared to the popular platforms, is the real earning potential it offers.

Whether you are an artist, a Vlogger, an Influencer or an expert, your effort and work will be rewarded by earning RNO.
A lucrative 65% share of the advertising revenue that Earneo receives will be distributed to Content Creators.

Earneo reward even the viewers ! 
By watching videos on Earneo.tube, you earn crypto. 
How is this possible? 
Earneo share the advertising revenue with all the users

RNO token is a Binance chain BEP2  token, which is  used to reward Earneo users.
Token will be redeemed with advertising revenue, to ensure constant liquidity and growth.
